title: Restaurant Vegetariano Vida Sana
description: Clean, simple, vegan restaurant. Soy milk, cheese, and yogurt made-in-house on site. Inexpensive set menu (5 soles), as well as seitan and soy dishes such as chicharron and bistek. Open for breakfast and lunch. Located in front of Radio Frontera, take a moto-taxi to Sala Verde / Radio Frontera, five blocks from the Plaza de Armas. Opened in Summer 2011.
